522680.name: STANDBY Demo
522680.description:
STANDBY – lightning-paced minimalistic platformer with challenging and brutal-colored action. You are a little man trying to beat the broken game which was infected by the Glitch. Be ready for a lot of slide 'em up and insanely intense moments challenging reaction.

FEATURES

  • 9 Demo levels
  • Welcome to the world of uber-fast speeds, where every move counts
  • Challenge yourself with a break-neck SpeedRun Mode
  • Fight for your right to be on the top of the Global Leaderboard
  • Enjoy glitchy beats of the finest electronic music
